Brilliant app! It helps to ensure my jobs as a Specialist Kitchen Hand (SKH) at Hungry Jack's are always completed on time, and it helps me to stay on top of chores at home. On the topic of mental health, I have an idea to help expand your app further and transform it from just a To Do List app, to a mentally equipped chore app. If you can add a feature where we can assign "breaks," that'll help to motivate us with ADHD. Even time before the next upcoming task can automatically become breaks.
replyContent: We're so happy to hear the app helps you manage your professional and home tasks effectively! That's a very insightful suggestion regarding implementing dedicated "break" features to help users with ADHD stay motivated.
